name: folioblocks-out-of-scope-script
Description: A set of commands that contains a set of redundant commands that I can run later.

scripts.deploy-to-local: pwsh -Command npm run docker-node-master; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-1; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-2; npm run docker docker-node-archival-miner-3
scripts.deploy-to-azure: pwsh -Command clear; npm run deploy-master-node; npm run deploy-archival-miner-node-1; npm run deploy-archival-miner-node-2; npm run deploy-archival-miner-node-3
scripts.deploy-master-node: pwsh -Command npm run docker-node-master-clear; npm run docker-node-master-build; docker tag folioblocks-node-master folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-master:latest; docker push folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-master:latest
scripts.deploy-archival-miner-node-1: pwsh -Command npm docker-node-archival-miner-1-clear; docker-node-archival-miner-1-build; docker tag folioblocks-node-archival-1 folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-archival-1:latest; docker push folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-archival-1:latest
scripts.deploy-archival-miner-node-2: pwsh -Command npm docker-node-archival-miner-2-clear; docker-node-archival-miner-2-build; docker tag folioblocks-node-archival-2 folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-archival-2; docker push folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-archival-2:latest
scripts.deploy-archival-miner-node-3: pwsh -Command npm docker-node-archival-miner-3-clear; docker-node-archival-miner-3-build; docker tag folioblocks-node-archival-3 folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-archival-3; docker push folio.azurecr.io/folioblocks-node-archival-3:latest
scripts.view-master-node-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-master-node;
scripts.view-master-node-live-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-master-node --follow
scripts.view-archival-miner-node-1-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-archival-miner-node-1
scripts.view-archival-miner-node-1-live-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-archival-node-1 --follow
scripts.view-archival-miner-node-2-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-archival-miner-node-2
scripts.view-archival-miner-node-2-live-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-archival-node-2 --follow
scripts.view-archival-miner-node-3-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-archival-miner-node-2
scripts.view-archival-miner-node-3-live-log: pwsh -Command clear; az container logs --resource-group folio-proto --name folioblocks --container folioblocks-archival-node-3 --follow
scripts.docker-node-master: pwsh -Command clear; npm run docker-node-master-clear; npm run docker-node-master-build; npm run docker-node-master-run
scripts.docker-node-master-build: pwsh -Command docker build -f 'Dockerfile-node' --build-arg NODE_HOST=0.0.0.0 --build-arg NODE_PORT=6001 --build-arg NODE_ROLE=MASTER_NODE -t folioblocks-node-master .
scripts.docker-node-master-clear: pwsh -Command docker stop folioblocks-master-instance; docker rm folioblocks-master-instance
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-1: pwsh -Command clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-build; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-run
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-1-build: pwsh -Command docker build -f 'Dockerfile-node' --build-arg NODE_HOST=0.0.0.0 --build-arg NODE_PORT=5001 --build-arg NODE_ROLE=ARCHIVAL_MINER_NODE -t folioblocks-node-archival-1 .
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-1-clear: pwsh -Command docker stop folioblocks-archival-miner-instance; docker rm folioblocks-archival-miner-instance
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-2: pwsh -Command clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-build; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-run
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-2-build: pwsh -Command docker build -f 'Dockerfile-node' --build-arg NODE_HOST=0.0.0.0 --build-arg NODE_PORT=5002 --build-arg NODE_ROLE=ARCHIVAL_MINER_NODE -t folioblocks-node-archival-2 .
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-2-clear: pwsh -Command docker stop folioblocks-archival-miner-instance; docker rm folioblocks-archival-miner-instance
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-3: pwsh -Command clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-clear; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-build; npm run docker-node-archival-miner-run
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-3-build: pwsh -Command docker build -f 'Dockerfile-node' --build-arg NODE_HOST=0.0.0.0 --build-arg NODE_PORT=5003 --build-arg NODE_ROLE=ARCHIVAL_MINER_NODE -t folioblocks-node-archival-3 .
scripts.docker-node-archival-miner-3-clear: pwsh -Command docker stop folioblocks-archival-miner-instance; docker rm folioblocks-archival-miner-instance
scripts.reload-master-node: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/master/** .; npm run backend-master
scripts.reload-archival-node-1: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/1/** .; npm run backend-archival-1
scripts.reload-archival-node-2: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/2/** .; npm run backend-archival-2
scripts.reload-archival-node-3: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; cp backup/archival/3/** .; npm run backend-archival-3
scripts.reset-master-node: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-master
scripts.reset-archival-node-1: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-archival-1
scripts.reset-archival-node-2: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-archival-2
scripts.reset-archival-node-3: pwsh -Command clear; npm run clear-node-files; npm run backend-archival-3
